001
002package com.commercetools.api.client;
003
004import java.util.List;
005import java.util.function.UnaryOperator;
006
007import com.commercetools.api.models.Versioned;
008import com.commercetools.api.models.customer.*;
009
010public interface ByProjectKeyCustomersRequestBuilderMixin {
011    public ByProjectKeyCustomersByIDRequestBuilder withId(String ID);
012
013    public ByProjectKeyCustomersPost post(CustomerDraft customerDraft);
014
015    public default ByProjectKeyCustomersByIDPost update(Versioned<Customer> customer,
016            List<CustomerUpdateAction> actions) {
017        return withId(customer.getId())
018                .post(builder -> CustomerUpdate.builder().version(customer.getVersion()).actions(actions));
019    }
020
021    public default ByProjectKeyCustomersByIDPost update(Versioned<Customer> customer,
022            UnaryOperator<UpdateActionBuilder<CustomerUpdateAction, CustomerUpdateActionBuilder>> op) {
023        return withId(customer.getId()).post(builder -> CustomerUpdate.builder()
024                .version(customer.getVersion())
025                .actions(op.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(CustomerUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
026    }
027
028    public default WithUpdateActionBuilder<CustomerUpdateAction, CustomerUpdateActionBuilder, ByProjectKeyCustomersByIDPost> update(
029            Versioned<Customer> customer) {
030        return builder -> withId(customer.getId()).post(b -> CustomerUpdate.builder()
031                .version(customer.getVersion())
032                .actions(builder.apply(UpdateActionBuilder.of(CustomerUpdateActionBuilder::of)).actions));
033    }
034
035    public default ByProjectKeyCustomersByIDDelete delete(Versioned<Customer> customer) {
036        return withId(customer.getId()).delete().withVersion(customer.getVersion());
037    }
038
039    public default ByProjectKeyCustomersPost create(CustomerDraft customerDraft) {
040        return post(customerDraft);
041    }
042
043    public default ByProjectKeyCustomersPost create(UnaryOperator<CustomerDraftBuilder> op) {
044        return post(op.apply(CustomerDraftBuilder.of()).build());
045    }
046}
